On 28 June 1914, Gavrilo Princip, a Serbian nationalist, assassinated the Austro-Hungarian heir Archduke Franz Ferdinand in Sarajevo. In response, on 23 July, Austria-Hungary issued an ultimatum to Serbia. Serbia's reply failed to satisfy the Austrians, and the two moved to a war footing. Russia and France quickly mobilized to support Serbia while Germany mobilized in support of Austria-Hungary. On 3 August, Germany invaded Belgium in accordance with the Schlieffen plan of knocking out France in a quick surprise attack. The invasion of Belgium brought the United Kingdom into the war on the side of France and Russia, who had formed the Allied Powers. The Ottomans soon joined on the side of Germany and Austria and together they formed the Central Powers. Europe finds itself engulfed in the greatest war the world has ever seen, can you lead your side to victory in the war to end all wars?

The world in 1913 is a powderkeg waiting to explode. France wishes to avenge their defeat in the Franco-Prussian war and retake Alsace-Lorraine from Germany. The Tsardom's grip on Russia has weakened due to recent revolts and a humiliating loss to Japan in the Russo-Japanese war. Japan continues its imperial ambitions in Asia. Austria-Hungary is facing a wave of nationalism in the Balkans. Italy wants to assert its place among the great powers at the expense of Austria-Hungary. The Ottoman Empire is reeling from its losses in the Balkan Wars. The United Kingdom's colonial empire is still unmatched, but is being threatened by rising powers. Germany is the undisputed land power in Europe and has built a powerful fleet with the aim of challenging the UK's hegemony over the rest of the world. The United States has overtaken Britain and Germany as the world's biggest economy, but it remains to be seen if they can leverage their industrial might into military might. Who will rise and who will fall in these chaotic times?

A creeping barrage was a barrage that lifted in small increments, usually 100 yards every few minutes, so that it moved forward slowly, keeping pace with the infantry. Eventually, three patterns of advancing the barrage developed. In a creeping barrage, fire moved from one line to the next. In a block barrage, the 'block' moved as block to the next lines that were not previously engaged. In a rolling barrage, the fire on the line nearest to own troops moved to the first unengaged line furthest from own troops.

The role of medium tanks started with a prioritisation of speed. Medium tanks could travel faster, but needed help to cross trenches, where heavy tanks were large enough to cross unaided. In this later use, medium tanks represent the designer's intent of producing a successful balance of firepower, mobility, and protection. Medium tanks aim to be suitable to the widest variety of roles, with less reliance on other types of tank during normal operations.

An aircraft carrier is a warship that serves as a seagoing airbase, equipped with a full-length flight deck and facilities for carrying, arming, deploying, and recovering aircraft. Carriers allows a naval force to hit targets from far beyond the range of traditional guns.

Naval aviation is typically projected to a position nearer the target by way of an aircraft carrier. Carrier-based aircraft must be sturdy enough to withstand demanding carrier operations. They must be able to launch in a short distance and be sturdy and flexible enough to come to a sudden stop on a pitching flight deck

Smokeless powder is the name given to a number of propellants used in firearms and artillery that produce negligible smoke when fired. It has several advantages over traditional gunpowder such as increased muzzle velocity, decreased barrel corrosion, and less smoke produced when fired. These advantages combined with the cheaper costs of manufacturing smokeless powder led to it replacing black powder in military and industrial use.

Synthetic rubber, like other polymers, is made from various petroleum-based monomers. A mixture of coal and oil is added together and then refined to produce the flammable hydrocarbon naphtha, which is then combined with natural gas to produce monomers. Chemical additives bond together with the monomers to form chains of polymers and the resulting product then undergoes vulcanisation in order to produce synthetic rubber.

The Bergius process is a method of production of liquid hydrocarbons for use as synthetic fuel by hydrogenation of high-volatile bituminous coal at high temperature and pressure. It was first developed by Friedrich Bergius in 1913.

The HaberBosch process, is an artificial nitrogen fixation process and is the main industrial procedure for the production of ammonia today. The process converts atmospheric nitrogen (N2) to ammonia (NH3) by a reaction with hydrogen (H2) using a metal catalyst under high temperatures and pressures.

Portland cement is the most common type of cement in general use around the world as a basic ingredient of concrete, mortar, stucco, and non-specialty grout. It was developed from other types of hydraulic lime in England in the early 19th century by Joseph Aspdin, and usually originates from limestone.

A rotary kiln is a pyroprocessing device used to raise materials to a high temperature (calcination) in a continuous process. The earliest successful rotary kilns were developed in Pennsylvania around 1890, and were about 1.5 m in diameter and 15 m in length. Such a kiln made about 20 tonnes of cement per day.

Welcome to the tutorial of Victoria Universalis. This mod introduces several new features and game mechanics that give the player more control over their provinces and POPs. Decisions with clear instructions on how to trigger them have replaced most events. Credit to HPM for historical country files and art assets. If you want to end the tutorial, select the first option, if you wish to know more pick the second.
I would like to know more.

There are several decisions denoted by their green titles in the decisions tab that give bonuses to specific provinces or states. In order to use these decisions, you must first build a Province Selector (PS) building in the desired location. After enacting each decision, the PS used in the decision will be destroyed. Do not build more than one PS at a time, as the decisions will distribute their effects to a random owned province that both fulfills the conditions and has a PS, so having two or more built at the same time could result in your decision not firing in the province you wanted.
I would like to know more.

Max mine sizes have been lowered to between 5,000 to 30,000 depending on the type and location of the of mine. Labourers no longer promote into craftsmen unless their RGO is full and the excess starting labourers in mining provinces have been converted to artisans. Rubber, timber, and tropical wood RGOs now employ farmers instead of miners. A province selector decision was added to expand mining size that can be used once per province. This was done to more accurately model historical mining employment and allow provinces to have high output even with low populations.
I would like to know more.

Daily research points from average literacy was reduced and a new category of reforms called Research & Development was added that gives +0.2 RPs and -1% tax efficiency per level. There are 10 levels of R&D reforms and each level requires an additional 10% average literacy to pass. R&D reforms can be raised or lowered instantly and without cost via decision. At the beginning of every year, POPs with over 10% literacy will lose literacy  at a rate of 0.1% for every 10 literacy, so a POP with 50% literacy will lose 0.5% and a POP with 100% literacy will lose 1%. The max base cap for clergymen is 2% and is increased by 0.5% per school reform level, up to a max of 4%.
I would like to know more.

A POP's chance to migrate to a colony is now calculated based on the new Colonial Migration reform, which can be raised or lowered at any time via decision. POPs migrating to the colonies will not migrate to states with the §RIndirect Rule§b modifier and only move to states with the §GSettlement§b modifier. §GSettlement§b is denoted in the province window by a new settler icon and §RIndirect Rule§b is denoted by a blacked out settler icon. These two province modifiers can be swapped at any time by building a province selector in the target colonial state and enacting the §BColonial Policy§b decision.
I would like to know more.

Negative general traits have been removed and the cost of recruiting generals has been increased from 20 to 40. A general's attack and defence stats are now clearly displayed in the general selection boxes and they are color coded with the following values: +1 is black, +2 is §Bblue§b, +3 is §Ggreen§b, +4 is §Rred§b, and +5 is §Wwhite§b. Literacy, country size, and national ideas now also factor into leadership point generation.
I would like to know more.

Every 5 points of revanchism now increases both your mobilization pool and maximum solder cap in cored states by 0.5%, capped up to 5% each. Your country gains revanchism by losing core territory, and it is calculated by number of provinces lost not by population lost. You can view your current revanchism by looking in the political tab next to your government type.
I would like to know more.

POP promotion factors and national focus bonuses has been split up into 3 tiers. Large states between 2M and 4M population have roughly 2/3rd the promotion rate as normal states, and massive states over 4M population have roughly 1/3rd the promotion rate as normal states. States have been redrawn such that no state outside of China and India will have over 2M population before the very late game.
I would like to know more.

Healthcare reforms are time locked, require certain techs to pass, and they have to be funded via the social spending slider in order to get the bonus. You get no pop growth benefit just by passing the reform, in order to receive the benefits of the reform you must have your social spending slider set to the minimum amount listed in the reform. The money spent on healthcare counts as income for POPs and is taxed just like any other income.
I would like to know more.

A number of small changes have been made in an effort to balance the in-game economy and lessen the frequency of economic crashes. New factory goods have been introduced and POP needs have been rebalanced to make normally useless goods more important. RGO outputs and factory inputs/outputs have all been tweaked for more even distribution of goods. A world bank has been implemented that prevents the prices of RGO goods from crashing by buying some of the unsold resources in the world market. The world bank will always be in last place in the rankings which puts it last on the buy order.
I would like to know more.

The first thing you should research is your first national idea tech in the commerce tab. Use the pass reform decision to increase school reform if you have low literacy. Max out national admin efficiency by promoting bureaucrats in your largest accepted culture POP states. Tariff efficiency, building costs, POP promotion, and half the crime fighting rate are based off your national admin efficiency. National admin efficiency does not take into account where the bureaucrats are located, so you can increase bureaucrats in your biggest state with accepted culture POPs above 1% in order to max out national admin efficiency. State admin efficiency is different from national admin efficiency and does not have any affect on POP promotion rates, tariffs, or taxes.
I would like to know more.

Worried by the growth of the socialist movement, Bismarck instituted the Anti-Socialist Laws in 1878. Socialist organizations and meetings were forbidden - except the SPD, which was allowed to take part in the elections - as was the circulation of socialist literature. Bismarck's strategy in the 1880s was to win the workers over for the conservative regime by implementing social benefits. He added accident and old-age insurance as well as a form of socialized medicine.

The current Argentinian constitution was drafted in $YEAR$ and approved by all provincial governments despite a rebellion from Buenos Aires.  It was closely inspired by the juridical and political doctrines of the United States Federal Constitution, establishing for instance a Republican division of powers, a high level of independence for the provinces, and a federal power controlled by a strong executive government yet limited by a bicameral national congress.
We have finally fulfilled our destiny as masters of North America.

The Indian Civil Service (ICS), was the elite higher civil service of the British Empire in British India during British rule. They were ultimately responsible for overseeing all government activity in the 250 districts that comprised British India. They were appointed under Section XXXII of the Government of India Act $YEAR$, enacted by the Parliament of the United Kingdom.

The civil services were divided into two categories  covenanted and uncovenanted. The covenanted civil service consisted of British civil servants occupying the higher posts in the government. The uncovenanted civil service was introduced to facilitate the entry of Indians at the lower rung of the administration. The Aitchison Commission was set up in $YEAR$ to come up with a scheme for fulfilling the claims of Indians to higher and more extensive employment in public service.
The Talpur kingdom of Sindh is inefficiently and loosely governed by the Amirs and a relatively easy target for expansion.

The "Lion of Punjab", Maharaja Ranjit Singh, has died without an heir. Internal division among the Sikh leadership have left them in a severely weakened state and provde us with a ripe opportunity to extend company control over the Punjab region.
The Baloch leaders of Kalat and Makran have agreed to accept British mediation over their local disputes. We may convince them to voluntarily become British protectorates.
Local commanders in Burma have suggested military expansion into the Burmese Kingdom.

The border of the British Raj and Afghanistan has been under contention ever since the defeat of the Sikhs, with the Emir of Afghanistan claiming Baluchistan for himself. It is time we settled this border dispute.
As the undisputed power in South East Asia, we can force the Sikkim government to submit to our suzerainty.

Ruling over such a huge population with a minority government is becoming increasingly difficult, one ethnic group we could look to for support is the Nepali people, many of which serve loyally in our Gurkha units. We could begin to reward the Nepali people for their services in our armies and to make them more loyal to our rule.
It is time for the Population of India to become part of the British Government
We must break British tyranny in India!

Lei Aurea, or the Golden Law, abolished slavery once and for all throughout Brazil. The law contained only two artices: Slavery was to be abolished, and any previous ruling contradicting the first article was now void.

The use of opium has spread throughout the land. Farmers and laborers fail to turn up for work, and entire fields fall fallow, as the people slip further and further down into the mists of consuming dependence.
The consumption of opium has been outlawed. Only time will tell if this ban is successful.
Now that we are in control of most of the world's supply of opium we can monopolize the drug trade in China.
They will not complain if they know what's good for them.
The opium trade with China has become untenable for us and our merchants have already begun to pull out of Chinese markets.
The chinese government has burned our recent shipments of opium and expelled our merchants from their shores. Our economy will suffer a serious blow if the ban stays in place. What shall we do?
Force them to lift the ban and make them pay for the shipments they have destroyed.

Millions of people in the surrounding provinces have joined his God Worshipping Society and are on the verge of open rebellion.

Yong Ying were a type of regional army that emerged in the 19th century in the Qing dynasty army, which fought in most of China's wars after numerous rebellions exposed the ineffectiveness of the regular Qing armies. The new rule "Soldiers followed the general, soldiers belonged to the general", led to decentralization of power and a rise of regional warlords within China.

The imperial examinations are a civil service examination system for selecting candidates for the state bureacracy. It focuses mainly on classic literature and Confucianist philosophy while omitting or downplaying western science, mathematics, and military affairs. Rigid adherence to the imperial exams is stifling the adoption of western technology and it must be abolished if China is to modernize in a timely fashion.

The imperial examinations were a civil service examination system in Imperial China for selecting candidates for the state bureaucracy. By the time of the late Qing dynasty, its Confucianist principles were directly at odds with modern western thought.

Reformers in our court warn us of the growing power of the West and they say that we must embark upon a path of modernization in order to not fall behind. However, the conservative hardliners will oppose any attempt at supplanting our traditional Confucianist systems with barbaric European science.
The numerous defeats we have suffered to rebellions and foreigners have convinced both the court and population of the need for reform.

The New Policies were a series of cultural, economic, educational, military, and political reforms that were implemented in the last decade of the Qing dynasty to keep the dynasty in power after a series humiliating defeats by foreign powers.

We have been humiliated and forced to sign an unequal treaty that allows an unrestricted flow of opium into our country from the west. It will take some time before we can build up enough strength to challenge the westerners again.
Our monopoly on the opium trade with China is a great boon to our economy.

In the 18th and 19th century Pest became the natural commercial, transportation, industrial and cultural centre of Hungary while nearby towns of Buda and Óbuda remained small. The Chain Bridge linking Buda with Pest was opened some time ago as the first permanent bridge across the Danube and everyday the town of Pest grows in importance, rivalling Vienna. But to have a modern metropolis, with enough space for a growing population and big enough to accommodate the ever growing Pest, it would be wise if we unified the three towns of Buda, Óbuda and Pest in one capital: Budapest.
Perhaps it is in our best interest to seek reconciliation with Italy.

The laws raised food prices and the costs of living for the British public, and hampered the growth of other British economic sectors. The Far East remains an enigma, and one which is beyond the reach of most western powers due to the enforced seclusion of China and Japan. While China is largely spoken for, Japan remains a potential target for American influence to expand. If we are to be taken seriously as a world power, we must consider sending a force to negotiate for trade rights with the Japanese-- under the threat of military force, if necessary.

More 'black ships' have appeared off our shores, these ones commanded by an American named Commodore Matthew Perry. The ill-tempered westerner is demanding an end to the Japanese policy of Sokoku -- specifically trading rights in several ports, extraterritoriality for American sailors and protection for their shipwrecks. At first he demanded to negotiate with the Emperor, but that is impossible. Thus it falls to the Shogun to either agree to his demands, risking the appearance of weakness, or refuse and bring the wrath of the Americans upon us.
We have little choice but to agree.
Never! We will fight the Americans if we must.

Commodore Perry has returned from his mission to Japan with a treaty in hand: we have gained numerous trade concessions, but more importantly we have cracked open the shield that is Japan's policy of isolation. This is a great coup for American diplomacy and influence in the Far East.

Commodore Perry has returned from his mission to Japan with unfortunate news: they have chosen to defy his ultimatum and thumb their collective noses at our government. Should we back down now, it will be a great blow to our prestige and our influence in the Far East.
We cannot afford a war on the other side of the Pacific.
The Boshin War was a civil war in Japan, fought between forces of the Tokugawa shogunate and those seeking to return political power to the Imperial Court.

Sakoku was the isolationist foreign policy of the Japanese Tokugawa shogunate (aka Bakufu) under which, for a period of 214 years, relations and trade between Japan and other countries were severely limited, nearly all foreign nationals were barred from entering Japan and common Japanese people were kept from leaving the country.

Rangaku (literally "Dutch learning", and by extension "Western learning") is a body of knowledge developed by Japan through its contacts with the Dutch enclave of Dejima, which allowed Japan to keep abreast of Western technology and medicine in the period when the country was closed to foreigners, 16411853, because of the Tokugawa shogunate's policy of national isolation (sakoku).

The Rangaku movement (literally "Western learning"), became increasingly involved in Japan's political debate over foreign isolation, arguing that the imitating of Western culture would strengthen rather than harm Japan. The Rangaku increasingly disseminated contemporary Western innovations throughout the first half of the 19th century.

Sakoku was the isolationist foreign policy of the Japanese Tokugawa shogunate under which, relations and trade between Japan and other countries were severely limited, nearly all foreign nationals were barred from entering Japan and common Japanese people were kept from leaving the country. §RCivilization Progress must be 5% in order to enact this decision.

Ansei Purge was a multi-year event in Japanese history of the Edo period, during which the Tokugawa shogunate imprisoned, executed, or exiled those who did not support its authority and foreign trade policies.

Fukoku kyohei ("Enrich the Country, Strengthen the Armed Forces"), was Japan's national slogan during the Meiji period. Although the government played a major role in providing the setting for industrialization, private enterprise also played a critical role in modernization efforts.

The Iwakura Mission was a Japanese diplomatic voyage to the United States and Europe by leading statesmen and scholars of the Meiji period. The aim of the mission was threefold: to gain recognition for the newly reinstated imperial dynasty under the Emperor Meiji, to begin preliminary renegotiation of the unequal treaties with the dominant world powers, and to make a comprehensive study of modern industrial, political, military and educational systems and structures in the United States and Europe.

Enacted after the Meiji Restoration, it provided for a form of mixed constitutional and absolute monarchy, based jointly on the Prussian and British models. In theory, the Emperor of Japan was the supreme leader, and the Cabinet, whose Prime Minister would be elected by a Privy Council, were his followers. In practice, the Emperor was head of state but the Prime Minister was the actual head of government.

Han is a Japanese historical term for the estate of a daimyo in the Edo and early Meiji period. The new Meiji government sought to abolish feudalism in Japan, and the title of daimyo in the han system was altered to han-chiji. In few decades time, almost all of the domains were disbanded and replaced with a new Meiji system of prefectures which were directly subordinate to the national government in Tokyo.

Our advisors believe that any enroachment upon Korea by foreign powers will threaten the security of Japan itself, thus it would be prudent to establish a Japanese protectorate over the Korea before the western powers can.
Helping the Koreans develop their economy would open their markets to us and further increase our influence over them.
The Korean state and its institutions are already under our control. It is time to end their facade of independence.

In a show of gunboat diplomacy, the Japanese have demanded we end our isolationism and accept their offer of protecionism. We are wary of foreign meddling in our affairs, however refusal to meet their demands may result in war.
The Koreans have agreed to an unequal treaty with us.
The Koreans have rebuffed our offer.
They will open up to us, one way or another.
The Koreans have agreed to become a vassal of Japan.
The Japanese ambassador has delivered to us a set of demands that forces us to surrender all rights of sovereignty to the Empire of Japan. He says this treaty is non-negotiable. What do we reply?
The Koreans have accepted our demands to become part of our glorious empire.
The Koreans have rejected our demands of annexation and declared an end to our protectorate over them.

Due to cartographic limitations, the exact boundary of our claims to the North West Territories of Canada granted to us by the crown have been ambiguous. An expedition should be dispatched to resolve this issue once and for all.

A bill has been passing through Parliament which would see the entirety of Rupert's Land -- all North American colonial territory between British Columbia and Ontario -- being annexed into the Canadian Confederation. Currently the land is administered by the Hudson's Bay Company, and thus we would be required to purchase it.
The Canadian government has offered to purchase the territory controlled by the Hudson's Bay Company in Rupert's Land.
The Canadian government wishes to incorporate our territory into their new confederacy.
The crown has agreed to the sale of Rupert's Land.
The crown has vetoed the sale of Rupert's Land.
From sea to sea no more.
The Australian Colonies Government Act of $YEAR$
The various constituent colonies of Australia have proposed a bill to British Parliament that would allow for an Australian federation and the right to limited self government.
The interior of the Australian continet has not yet been mapped out. Explorers from all over the world have offered to explore the land for us.

In response to increased petitioning for self-governance from a growing number of British settlers in New Zealand, a proposal has been made to British Parliament that would set up a central government with an elected General Assembly and six provincial governments.
British settlers have begun migrating to the sparsely populated South Island. The colonists have asked to form a union with North Island and join the New Zealand state.

Frequent raids and skirmishes by neighbouring Xhosa tribes have taken its toll on the military and finances of Cape Colony. The governor-general has authorized a final war to end the Xhosa threat once and for all.
War has erupted in our crown colony of South Africa.
The governor of Cape Colony has issued a proclamation declaring his intent to resume British military occupation of Port Natal.

A band of Boer Voortrekkers have invaded us in an act of revenge for our earlier attack against the laagers. They have delivered to us a crushing defeat at Blood River and seized control of the territory around the port city of Durban.
We have the opportunity to claim the newly formed Natalia Republic as a protectorate of Cape Colony.
The government of Cape Colony has declared their intent to annex us.
The Natalia Republic has agreed to our terms of annexation.
The Natalia Republic has rejected our terms of annexation.
We will force them to accept!
The natural borders of Cape Colony extend north all the way to the Orange River. An expedition will be dispatched to formally bring that territory under our control.
We can incorporate the neighboring territory around Dikathong and Kimberley as part of North Cape Colony.

The Zulu king has rejected an ultimatum provided by one of our diplomats over the settlement of a border dispute between the Zulu Kingdom and the Republic of Transvaal. This gives us a convenient casus beli to start a war with the Zulus.

Migrants have been moving in large numbers through our colony on the Cape, on their way to the newly incorporated town of 'Johannesburg', where a major gold rush is taking place. The massive influx of foreign residents to the area is causing trouble along our borders, and this might be a valid excuse to end the independence of these pesky fringe states.
With the conquest of South Africa complete, a proposal has been made to British Parliament to combine former Cape Colony with the Boer Republics into a self-governing Union of South Africa.
Bloemfontein would make a suitable location for the capital of our new republic.
Pretoria would make a suitable location for the capital of our new republic.
Defeat at the hands of the Boers have pushed our people to seek the protection of the British in Cape Colony.
The Basotho have come to offer their loyalty to us in exchange for protection from the Boers.

The Great Trek (Die Groot Trek), was a mass migration of Dutch-speaking inhabitants of the British-run Cape Colony, who left the Cape and travelled eastward by wagon train, into the interior of the continent, in order to live beyond the reach of the British colonial administration. The Great Trek led directly to the founding of several autonomous Boer republics, namely the South African Republic (also known as Transvaal), the Orange Free State, and the Natalia Republic.

Born in 1830 as Al-Zubayr Rahma Mansur, he began his large-scale business in 1856, when he left Khartoum with a small army, to set up a network of trading forts, focusing his efforts on slave trading and ivory sales. At its height, his trading empire controlled much the Bahr el Ghazal as well as what are today parts of Chad and the Central African Republic. He was referred to as "the richest and worst", a "Slaver King" "who had chained lions as part of his escort".
We will keep a close eye on him.
The war is going badly for us, maybe the Ottomans will accept a peace deal if we agree to give up our claims in the Levant.
With the rest of South Sudan under our control, now would be an opportune time to bring the Sultanate of Darfur back under the rule of the Khedivate.

Rising resentment toward foreign rulers, lax religious standards, and the abolishment of the slave trade, has caused a Muslim cleric named Muhammad Ahmad to preach renewal of the faith and liberation of the land. He has attracted a large following in Sudan and declared open revolt against Egyptian rule.
As an independent nation we are now free to appoint our own government.
A supply route to our holdings in Transcaucasia must be established via the annexation of the North Caucasian imamates if we are to consolidate our rule in the region.
Now that we have established a direct border with our transcaucasian client states, we can formally integrate them into our empire.

In 1857, the Minister of War, Dmitry Milyutin, argued in regards to the pacification of Circassia, that "eliminating the Circassians was to be an end in itself  to cleanse the land of hostile elements". Although the order given by Tsar Alexander II was to deport the Circassians rather than to massacre them, the Russian commanders were open to the idea of massacring large portions of the Circassian population, and General Fadeyev wrote that the Russian command decided "to exterminate half the Circassian people to get the other half to lay down their arms." In the end, up to 1,500,000 (75% of the total Circassian population) were killed or expelled, with most of the survivors fleeing to the Ottoman Empire.

A graduate of the Nicholas Military Academy in 1836, Dmitry Milyutin served in the Caucasus and later a lecturer at the Military Academy. Tsar Alexander II appointed Milyutin to be the Minister of War in $YEAR$. Milyutin proposed a series of reforms to improve the quality and provisioning of forces, and including the idea of conscription as the recruiting base for the forces.

The Russian press took up the topic of German influence in the Baltic provinces. As early as the 1860s, the Slavophiles demanded the end of the autonomy in the Baltic provinces and a standardized administration. The unification of Germany and its subsequent development into a Great Power considerably increased the military-strategic importance of the Estonian and Latvian territories which bordered the Baltic Sea, between the extensively autonomous Finland and the rebellious Poland-Lithuania. The security of the capital St Petersburg became a serious issue for the Russian Empire. Tsarist Russias government circles were afraid of the Baltic German's possible orientation towards Germany, especially worrying was the thought that by Germanizing the Estonians and Latvians, the Germans could become the majority nation in the Baltics.

Having enjoyed prosperity and control over their own affairs, and having remained loyal subjects for nearly a century, the manifesto which the $MONARCHTITLE$ issued on $YEAR$ was cause for Finnish despair. The manifesto was forced through the Finnish senate by the deciding vote of the senate president, an appointee of the $MONARCHTITLE$  and after the governor-general of Finland, Nikolay Bobrikov, had threatened a military invasion and siege. While ostensibly affirming the Finns' rights in purely local matters, the manifesto asserted the authority of the state in any and all matters which could be considered to "come within the scope of the general legislation of the empire".

The Solomonic dynasty is a puppet in Gonder and Ethiopia carries on divided. This era, known as the Zemene Mesafint or the 'Age of Princes', has warlords, regional princes, and noble houses vying with each other for power and control. They divided the Empire into personal fiefs and fought each other continuously. A puppet Emperor of the dynasty was enthroned in Gonder by one warlord, only to be dethroned and replaced by another member of the Imperial dynasty when a different warlord was able to seize Gonder and the reins of power. Regions such as Gojjam and Shewa were ruled by their own branches of the Imperial dynasty and, in Shewa, the local prince went as far as assuming the title of King. Now it's our time to try and seize the moment, to claim the title of King, to march on Gonder and all of Ethiopia and to try and bring an end to the infighting, to make Ethiopia whole once more.

The 'Zemene Mesafint' or the 'Age of Princes' is a period in Ethiopian history lasting from about 1769 to until now, during which Ethiopia was largely fractioned due to political infighting, and the imperial office reduced to the status of a mere figurehead. The $MONARCHTITLE$ of $COUNTRY$ could claim the title of 'Negusa Nagast', that is, 'King of Kings', to bring an end to the Age of Princes, and to usher in the modern Imperial era in Ethiopia. Is it time for a coronation?

Montenegro rebelled from our empire in the past, with several skirmishes around their border and our troops happening. We never lost our claim and never recognized their independence, but if we are to keep it this way we need to end this rebellion against our rule soon.
Death of Said bin Sultan Al-Said

The Sultan has died without heir and his realm is being divided amongst his sons. The third son of the late Sultan, Thuwaini bin Said, has established his rule over Oman. The sixth son, Majid bin Said, has declared a new independent Zanzibar Sultanate.
Our new land border to Luxembourg allows us to formally incorporate the duchy into our nation.

The Cultivation System (cultuurstelsel) was a Dutch government policy for its colonies that required a portion of agricultural production to be devoted to export crops. Instead of land taxes, 20% of village land had to be devoted to government crops for export or, alternatively, peasants had to work in government-owned plantations for 60 days of the year. Ending this practice will encourage private enterprise and attract more entrepreneurial settlers to the colonies.

Prior to the late 19th century recession, the Liberal Party had been dominant in policy making in the Netherlands. Its free market philosophy found its way to the Indies where the cultivation system was de-regulated. Under agrarian reforms from 1870, producers were no longer compelled to provide crops for exports, but the Indies were open up to private enterprise. Dutch businessmen set up large, profitable plantations. Sugar production doubled between 1870 and 1885
column3: new crops such as tea and cinchona flourished, and rubber was introduced, leading to dramatic increases in Dutch profits.

column2: The abolishment of the cultuurstelsel has spurred a wave of immigration and population growth in the East Indies, particularly around the colonial capital of Batavia. A renovation of the city would help accomodate the influx of new migrants and help facilitate the growth of new business.

The Liberal Period was seen as an important step forward in civilizing our colonial subjects, however it's main goal was still the extraction of resources from the colonies to the mainland. The $MONARCHTITLE$ is convinced that a more ethical approach is in order, one that puts the well being of our subjects above profits.

William III, King of the Netherlands and Grand Duke of Luxembourg, has died, and his only child, Wilhelmina, has ascended to the throne. Unfortunately the new queen has no claims to the crown of Luxembourg, and it is passed on to the House of Nassau.

Although the Cortes Gerais (General Courts) agreed to recgonize the independence of Brazil in 1825, a strong desire to restore Brazilian suzerainty to Portugal still exists among the elites in this country. If we are to retake the Brazilian breakaway states, we must do it quickly before they grow too accustomed independence.
Restore the United Kingdom of Portugal and Brazil
Independence movements in Brazil have been sufficiently pacified enough for us to consider elevating Brazil to equal status with Portugal..

The Kingdom of Kongo is currently engaged in a civil war over succession rights of the new king. One of the claimants has promised to become our vassal if we were to help him secure the throne in Mbanza.
It would be wise for us to start colonization of Inner Angola before the other Great Powers have a chance to stake a claim over the territory.

Before the Portuguese weakened us, we once ruled over the lands now inhabited by the Ngoyo and Kakango tribes. Now is the time to restore the great Kongo Empire. §RCivilization Progress must be 30% to enact this decision.
Our latest expedition has managed to subdue the tribes along the coast of Southern Angola and set up colony in there.
The trading port of Angoche is a major hub of illegal slaving in East Africa. We can use the abolition of the slave trade as a convenient casus belli for annexing the area.
It is time to end the Gaza Kingdom and expand our colonial holdings in Mozambique.

While technically in a personal union with the crown of Sweden since 1814, the Kingdom of Norway was allowed to draft its own constitution and handle its own domestic affairs. The Pan-Scandinavian movement is at an all time high and now would be a good time to solidify our union with Norway by granting them more representation and creating a new join Swedish-Norwegian government.
Estonians have always had close cultural and historical ties with us, and now that they are once again part of our nation it is time we embraced them as our Nordic bretheren.
Scottish have always had close cultural and historical ties with us, and now that they are once again part of our nation it is time we embraced them as our Nordic bretheren.

The dissolution of the union between the kingdoms of Norway and Sweden under the House of Bernadotte, was set in motion by a resolution of the Norwegian Parliament (the Storting) on 7 June 1905. Following some months of tension and fear of war between the neighboring kingdoms - and a Norwegian plebiscite held on 13 August which overwhelmingly backed dissolution  negotiations between the two governments led to Sweden's recognition of Norway as an independent constitutional monarchy on 26 October 1905.
The "New Flower" was founded in 1886 by Emperor Menelik II, Addis Ababa would become the capital of Ethiopia and the site of the Imperial Palace. §RMust be Civilized or 50% towards Civilizing.
It is time for the Europeans to witness our strength.

The confederation of Peru and Bolivia represents a threat to our interests. If the confederation is given time to solidify, they could easily become a new powerhouse in South America -- and one that is no friend to $COUNTRY$. Thankfully there are signs that the confederation is unstable: the Peruvians chafe at the Bolivian leadership, and given enough incentive they might withdraw. If we act now, we might be able to stir our people against them.
Reconciling with them is our only hope.
The power of a potential Peru-Bolivian union has rattled the Chileans enough to declare war on us in an attempt to stop our consolidation efforts with Peru.
Victory over the Chileans has caused a surge in popular support for full integration of Peru and Bolivia.
Our defeat at the hands of the Chileans has ended any support for a continued union between Peru and Bolivia.

After the recent war the Argentines have taken Cochinoca and Tarija. Now with the post-war peace talks, our diplomats proposed that we raise the question of the settlement of the borders between Bolivia and Argentina. The best deal we can get by our diplomats calculations is to offer to renounce all our claims in Cochinoca, Uquia, Jujuy and Salta in exchange for their renouncement of their claims in Tarija.
We will not renounce our claims.
Our armies are destroyed and our capital has been captured by the Brazilians. What hope do we have left to win this war?
Our armies are destroyed and our capital has been captured by the Brazilians. What hope do we have left to win this war?
Our armies are destroyed and our capital has been captured by the Brazilians. What hope do we have left to win this war?
Our armies are destroyed and our capital has been captured by the Brazilians. What hope do we have left to win this war?
Military officer Francisco Sabino has staged a revolt in Bahia state, calling for the abolition of slavery and redistribution of land to the disenfranchised lower class.

A local rancher by the name of Raimundo Gomes has begun an open revolt in Maranhão over the illegal detention of his brother by the national guard. He has enlisted the aid of ex-slave Cosme Bento, along with his force of 3,000 escaped Africans, to oust the Brazilian authorities from Maranhão state.
Influenced by the liberal revolutions taking place in Europe, the people of Pernambuco province have revolted against our rule.
A revolt has broken out in our crown colony of Brazil

Tensions with Brazil have reached a boiling point over our continued support of the Blancos in Uruguay, who are fighting a civil war with the Brazilian backed Colorados. They have even gone so far as to sway the governors of Corrientes and Entre Rios into an alliance against us.
Make the Brazilian emperor our butler.
Withdraw from Uruguay and let Corrienties and Entre Rios have their independence..

Tensions with the Argentine Confederation have reached a boiling point over our continued support of the Colorados in Uruguay, who are fighting a civil war with the Argentine backed Blancos. We have managed to secure an alliance with the governors of Corrientes and Entre Rios, and in response the Argentine Confederation has declared war on us.
Victory in Río de la Plata!
We have crushed the Argentine breakaway states and expelled the Brazilians from the Platine region. Now there is no one to oppose our dominance over Argentina.
Defeat in Río de la Plata!

The Argentine rebels, aided by the Brazilian army, have forced us to surrender to their terms. The new capital of the Argentine Confederation has been moved to Paraná, and the caudillo of Entre Rios has assumed the presidency. The state of Buenos Aires has declared independence as well, citing their worries over their loss of autonomy in the confederation.
The continued existence of two separate Argentine states will soon become permanent if we do not unify the country.
We are the true rulers of Argentina!
The rogue state of Buenos Aires has made a move to unify the rest of Argentina under their rule.
We are the true rulers of Argentina!

Ever since the formal dissolution of the United States of Rio de La Plata in 1831, Argentina has been fractured into several semi-independent states ruled by competing caudillos. Although they are all nominally members of the Argentine Confederation, they spend more time fighting each other than they do foreigners. It is time to end this era of strife, and unite the Argentine provinces into one single Argentina - under our rule of course.

In 1835, Manuel Oribe, a leader of Uruguayan independence, was elected as the second President of Uruguay while Fructuoso Rivera, the first president of Uruguay, remained as the commander of Army. Oribe pursued his own policies and in January 1836 removed Rivera from the command. Soon afterwards, Rivera rebelled against Oribe. To distinguish his soldiers, Oribe ordered them to wear a white armband. Rivera then ordered his supporters to wear blue, but as it quickly faded, they started using red armbands. Out of these military distinction marks quickly emerged the conservative Blancos ("Whites") and the liberal Colorados ("Reds").
The recent election of a Blanco government has spurned anti-conservative movements within the country.
The recent election of a Colorado government has spurned anti-liberal movements within the country.
End of the Uruguayan Civil War
Recent governmental reforms have finally allowed the Blancos and Colorados to settle their differences politically rather than militariliy.
This modifier makes POPs more likely to become conservative.
This modifier makes POPs more likely to become liberal.

When Francisco Solano López assumed the presidency from his father, he planned to elevate the status of Paraguay to the preeminent power in Latin America. To that end he undertook massive modernization reforms of the army, and conscripted most of the male population. Paraguay now boasts one of the largest and most modern militaries in South America, and it is time to put it to good use.
The recent war has united everyone of every class and ethnicity to fight for the fatherland.
We have crushed the Triple Alliance and realized the dream of Greater Paraguay.
We have been crushed by the Triple Alliance -- our dreams of Greater Paraguay are over.
It was not meant to be.
Now is the time to overthrow the monarchy and declare the Republic of the United States of Brazil.

For most of $COUNTRY$'s history, caudillos (strongmen) have ruled with an iron fist. Their rule has been marked by constant civil war and stifling of free markets in favor of their conservative gaucho supporters. The move away from caudillo style leadership is necessary if this country is to progress on the world stage.
Politics is dominated by Caudillo warlords who keep the country in a constant state of strife and repression.
Our country is starting its first attempts at industrialization by following Western free market ideals and courting foreign investments.
The states of Rio Grande do Sul and Paraná have taken advantage of the turbulence created by the Republican coup d'état to declare independence.

The inhabitants of Canudos village in Bahia state have staged an insurrection against the new republican government in Rio. There are fears of a monarchist plot to overthrow our new democracy - our response in Canudos must be swift and violent in order to set an example to the rest of the country.

A savant in his own right, the Emperor established a reputation as a vigorous sponsor of learning, culture, and the sciences, and he won the respect and admiration of people such as Charles Darwin, Victor Hugo, and Friedrich Nietzsche. He has been regarded by several historians in Brazil as the greatest Brazilian.

Born on 2 December 1825, Dom Pedro II was groomed to rule at an early age, as his father had fled to Europe and left him the throne of Brazil in 1831. His elevation to the throne led to a troublesome period of endless crises. The regency created to rule on his behalf was plagued from the start by disputes between political factions and rebellions across the nation that threatened to tear Brazil apart. Dom Pedro II would end up overcoming all of these obstacles and establish Brazil as the dominant power in South America.
Long live Emperor Dom Pedro II!

A proposal has been brought forth to finally push into the southern lands of Araucania and pacify them once and for all. $COUNTRY$ must make its claim so none can deny us. §RThis Decision is required to gain acceptence to South Andean By 1865.
A proposal has been brought forth to finally push into the southern Patagonian lands and pacify them once and for all. $COUNTRY$ must make its claim so none can deny us.
The Chaco region has largely remained in native hands until now. It's time to pacify this region and expand our borders, we need to claim this land so no one can deny it from us.
Alto Paraguay has been unincorporated until now. It's time to claim that it is rightfully ours so that no one can deny it from us.

The native population of Easter Island has suffered many devastations in recent years, from attacks by Peruvian pirates to a tuberculosis epidemic. A colonist has operated a sheep ranch there for some years, and recently offered to sell to our government. Considering his ranch covers a large portion of the island, we would be well within our rights to claim sovereignty over it.
Form the United Provinces of Rio de La Plata

The nations which were once part of the Viceroyalty of Rio de La Plata must be reunited under a single flag once again, the platinean peoples bound together into a great nation, a power to rule in the New World, the United Provinces of Rio de La Plata.

The Escuela de Artes y Oficios (EAO) was founded by Ignacy Domeyko, to improve scientific and technical development in the country. At the time, students ages ranged between 15 and 18 years old, thus making the EAO not a University, but a secondary education entity. Besides being intensely trained in workshops, students studied algebra, descriptive geometry, trigonometry, technical drawing, industrial mechanics, physics and chemistry, history and geography.

Valparaiso has become a required stopover for ships crossing between the Atlantic and Pacific oceans. In it's role as a major seaport, Valparaiso receives immigrants from many European countries, but this could change if a new route was to open.

The current president, José Manuel Balmaceda, has been clashing heads with the oligarchial families that traditionally ruled Chile. He has attempted to work around them by directly appointing representitives to the upper house outside the bounds of the constitution. In response, Congress has moved to depose Balmaceda and restore oligarchial parliamentary rule to Chile.
We have recently commissioned a warship from a foreign power.

One of our neighbours have recently purchased a foreign battleship, as well as the prestige that comes from owning such a ship. We should follow suit and commission our own battleship, lest we fall behind our rivals.

One of our neighbours have recently purchased a foreign dreadnought, as well as the prestige that comes from owning such a ship. We should follow suit and commission our own dreadnought, lest we fall behind our rivals.

In 1841, Congress elected Carlos Antonio López as Consul of Paraguay after the death of its previous dictator, José Gaspar Rodríguez. A few months later, Congress adopted a new constitution, which changed the head of state's title from consul to president and elected him to the new post for a 10-year term. The constitution effectively codified the dictatorial powers he had seized just months earlier as it included no guarantees of civil rights -- indeed, the word "liberty" was not even mentioned in the text. His reign was marked by ambitious military and industrial reforms that would enable his son, Francisco Solano López, to attempt to create Greater Paraguay -- to disastrous effect.

The easiest way for an invading army to reach our capital of Asunción is via the mouth of the River Paraguay, located between the border of Southern Paraguay and Corrientes. By constructing a fortress without equal at Humaitá we can secure our southern flank and deter any would be attackers from invading us.

An incident recently took place at the Talambó hacienda, in Lambayeque, Peru. The details are fragmentary, but the episode involved a fight that broke out between two Spanish residents and 40 local citizens in which one Spaniard died. This could serve as a convenient cassus belli for an intervention in our former colony.
Seize the Chinca Islands from Peru.

An incident recently took place at the Talambó hacienda, in Lambayeque, Peru. The details are fragmentary, but the episode involved a fight that broke out between two Spanish residents and 40 local citizens in which one Spaniard died. The Spaniards have used this as a pretext for an intervention in Peru.
We will never again submit to the Spanish!

The conservative general Julián Castro has recently staged a coup d'état and expelled all the traditional oligarchial caudillos from the government. Under the leadership of Ezequiel Zamora, the ousted caudillos have formed the anti-Castro Federalist Party and seek to regain control of the presidency.

The caudillo Juan José Flores has served two terms as President of Ecuador, and is trying to rewrite the constitution to allow himself to become dictator for life. A rebellion led by Vicente Rocafuerte seeks to depose him and return Ecuador to nominal democratic rule.

Congress has awarded to the president the power to remove the governors of the member states, and it created a second law that allowed the president direct control of the resources and governments of the member states through the creation of a number of administrative departments. Among many angered by these laws was respected and popular politician, leader of the Liberal Party, Tomás Cipriano de Mosquera, who denounced the laws as unconstitutional and rallied Liberal support. On May 8, 1860, the newly appointed Supreme Director of War Mosquera declared the Sovereign State of Cauca a separate nation and civil war broke out.

Though initially welcomed as liberators from the Spaniards in 1822, the Haitians' rule in Santo Domingo has since grown to be wildly unpopular. The cultural, linguistic, and racial divide between French Hispaniola and Spanish Hispaniola proved too be irreconcilable, and in 1844 the Dominican Republic declared its independence from Haiti.
The famed revolutionary Giuseppe Garibaldi has offered to sail with a corps of volunteers to Sicily and begin a war of Italian unification on our behalf.

Proposals for a Canal across the Panama Isthmus probably date back to the first discovery of the area. Nowhere is the strip of land that unites the North and South American continents thinner than here, and, with the aid of modern engineering, we could shorten the travel time between the Atlantic and The Pacific by several days by building it.
column3: Les propositions de construction d'un canal à travers le détroit de Panama remontent probablement à la première découverte de la région. Nulle part ailleurs une bande de terre reliant les continents nord et sud américains n'est aussi étroite qu'à cet endroit et, grâce à l'ingénierie moderne, nous pourrions raccourcir de plusieurs jours les voyages entre les océans Atlantique et Pacifique.
column4: Die Vorschläge für den Bau eines Kanals durch den Isthmus von Panama reichen wahrscheinlich bis zur Entdeckung des Gebiets zurück. The Short Declaration was short and brief because it contrasted with the "long" contracts that were earlier concluded between the Netherlands Indies government and some seventeen so-called self-governing lands. The latter were left under the charge of rulers who were empowered to deal with legislative and administrative matters pertaining to their territories, but they had to ensure that obligations to the Netherlands Indies government were met. Napoleon III (Charles Louis Napoléon Bonaparte 20 April 1808  9 January 1873) was the first President of France (as Louis-Napoléon Bonaparte) from 1848 to 1852 and Emperor of the French from 1852 to 1870. A nephew of Napoleon I, he was the last monarch to reign over France. Elected to the presidency of the Second Republic in 1848, he seized power by force in 1851, when he could not constitutionally be reelected he later proclaimed himself Emperor of the French. He founded the Second Empire, reigning until the defeat of the French Army and his capture by Prussia and its allies at the Battle of Sedan in 1870. Napoleon III was a popular monarch, who used plebiscites to guide his actions, oversaw the modernisation of the French economy and worked to have the centre of Paris rebuilt following Napoleon III style guidelines. He expanded the French overseas empire and made the French merchant navy the second largest in the world, engaged in the Crimean War, the Second Italian War of Independence, the Second Franco-Mexican War, as well as the disastrous Franco-Prussian War, in which he served alongside his soldiers during the fight, an uncommon action for a head of state in the modern era.

column2: The first organised police forces in Ireland came about through the Peace Preservation Act in 1814 for which Sir Robert Peel (1788-1850) was largely responsible and the Irish Constabulary Act in 1822 formed the provincial constabularies. The 1822 Act established a force in each province with chief constables and inspectors general under the civil administration for Ireland controlled by the Dublin Castle administration. \n\nThe original force had been reorganised under The Act of 1836, and the first constabulary code of regulations was published in 1837. The discipline was strict and the pay low. The police faced civil unrest among the Irish rural poor, and was involved in bloody confrontations during the period of the Tithe War. Other deployments were against organisations like the Ribbonmen, which attacked landlords, their property and stock.

In 1867, at the behest of the Japanese Shogunate at Edo, France sent a military mission to Japan to help train Shogunate troops in the arts of western warfare. The mission was led by, then Captain, Charles Chanoine, who would later go on to become France's Minister of War during the Brisson government of 1898. Send a military mission to Japan, and our relations with them are sure to improve.

A market square is a square meant for trading, in which a market is held. A market square is an open area where market stalls are traditionally set out for trading, commonly on one particular day of the week known as market day.
A street light is a raised source of light on the edge of a road or path. The first widespread system of street lighting used piped coal gas as fuel.

Public transport is a system of transport for passengers by group travel systems available for use by the general public unlike private transport, typically managed on a schedule, operated on established routes, and that may charge a posted fee for each trip.

An elevator is a machine that vertically transports people or freight between levels. They are typically powered by electric motors that drive traction cables and counterweight systems such as a hoist, although some pump hydraulic fluid to raise a cylindrical piston like a jack.
Modern Sewerage is the creation of specific tunnels and pipes to remove refuse from a city, leading to a better standard of living.

A skyscraper is a tall continuously habitable building having multiple floors. Historically, the term first referred to buildings with between 10 and 20 stories when these types of buildings began to be constructed in the 1880s. Skyscrapers may host offices, hotels, residential spaces, and retail spaces.

An airport is an aerodrome with extended facilities, mostly for commercial air transport. Airports usually consist of a landing area, which comprises an aerially accessible open space including at least one operationally active surface such as a runway for a plane to take off and to land.
